resources.string: Not enough colors are enabled. Please select more colors from the options screen.
You have a set number of guesses to guess the ordered 4-color code. To select a color, click a color from the bottom of the screen.
Once you select the 4 colors for a guess, hit the \"Guess\" button, and a \"hit\" and \"blow\" value will be displayed for that guess.
A \"hit\" means that one of the colors you guessed is correct, and is in the correct place.
A \"blow\" means that one of the colors you guessed is correct, but is NOT in the correct place.
Use the hit/blow values of your guesses to figure out the code.
You can change the number of guesses and the colors from the options screen.
